references.paper_title: A simple yet effective strategy to robustify the meta learning paradigm
references.reason: This paper is the most directly related work, and the current work builds upon and extends it.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in the field of meta-learning which is the basis for many other methods mentioned.
This paper introduces a core method used in meta-learning which is used as a comparison.
This paper introduces a key comparative approach to the current work.
This paper introduces a core concept used in the current work.
